page.title: 02LATCHINGDON PART 2
page.content: In writing our 20 pages of information we decided to write about ourselves, what we do, what we like and the things we do in our lives. Although we live in the countryside it is intensively farmed with many of the fields being made by digging out the hedges of 2,3 or 4 smaller fields to make them larger.The crops we saw growing when we did the survey were wheat and barley with a lot of oilseed rape this year and 2 fields of peas. The other thing we noticed was that many of the public footpaths were blocked up, either by farmers ploughing them up or because they were overgrown. This made access to the countryside much more difficult for us when we were doing our survey.
